topic.title: ZeroNet For Beginners
topic.body: Greetings all! I am someone interested in what I can do with Zero Net since I want to make content related to Info-Sec. Anything helps as I have no clue where to start. Cheers!

1572891014_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body: In my opinion, I'd go with Block chain. There is so much going on and you have plenty of sources to choose from.
